LanguageData.ChooseIdeo.text: This page is for choosing the ideoligion of your colonists. The term ideoligion includes religions, ideologies, and every other belief system that defines a moral structure in the universe.\n\nThe PLAY CLASSIC option here will work - go ahead and click it!
LanguageData.ChooseIdeo.rejectInputMessage: Please click PLAY CLASSIC to continue the tutorial.
